title: No writable calendars are configured ...
content:
Hi, I've the same issue as already reported a year ago here: https://support.mozilla.org/bm/questions/1358434

Thunderbird apparently only partially supports addon-provided calendars. When I get an E-Mail with an Invite or Appointment, it says: "No wirable calendars are configured for invitations, please check the calendar properties." But for addon calendars it is not possible to assign an e-mail address. And even if it was, I wouldn't be able to assign it to multiple mail accounts.

However, when I save the attached ics file and then open it with Thunderbird, I'm able to select my calendar. It would be nice to skip the save the attachment and reopen it in Thunderbird part and just be able to add the appointment to the calendars...
creator: agowa

title: New Thunderbird Update Has Lost My Sub Folders in Email
content: Since the newest Thunderbird update, Alot of my Folders in my emails, especially important ones have vanished. What is the best way to recover these please as I'm not very happy with what has happened. Please help me. Thank you
creator: bladerunner77

title: invio mail a gmail
content: Buongiorno, da questa mattina le mail che inviamo a indirizzi gmail.com non vengono consegnate al destinatario e ci ritorna il seguente messaggio: This message was created automatically by mail delivery software. A message that you sent could not be delivered to one or more of its recipients. This is a permanent error. The following address(es) failed: ecc... Potete esserci di aiuto? Le abbiamo sempre inviate fino a ieri senza problemi... Le riceviamo soltanto da gmail.com, abbiamo provato. In attesa ringraziamo anticipatamente
creator: ida.barberio

title: Unable to save you message as a draft. Sending of the message failed. After Thunderbird crashed. Windows 10
content: I made the mistake of trying to run message filters on an inbox of about 34000 emails and thunderbird started saying 'Unable to send mail' and froze up for a long time. I had to use Task Manager to close it and then reboot the PC to get back into Thunderbird. Now I can't send emails or save drafts. I've tried repairing folders and compacting. I've tried deleting the drafts folder from the profile and I've tried pointing the account to a different drafts folder. I'm still stuck.
creator: jwk630

title: Thunderbird help
content: I have been using Thunderbird for my email for decades now because it is so easy to use. Last week it began asking for a password when sending an email and not accepting it. Then I get a message there is a server error. I uninstalled it and re installed it. I hate the new format. I seem to have lost all my saved emails and files except trash of all things. Please help!! Thank-you, Eileen Velez
creator: emvelez

title: Folders
content:
First, let me compliment your mail program. I love it so far.

The problem I have is it will not download my folders (which have thousands of emails). If I have to download them manually, that's fine, if I knew how.

I'm utilizing Windows 10 Home edition.

Thanks in advance.
creator: randy.miller

title: Can't find Thunderbird IMAP account SENT file, where is it?
content: I need to restore a sent email that I deleted. I have incremental backup files. I have done this for Inbox so I know the procedure by way of Local Folders. In my backups and in my profile, I see INBOX, INBOX.msf, and Sent.msf but no SENT file? Where is it so that I can restore the sent email? Thanks!
creator: srhaymes

title: Transfering e-mail and archives from windows laptop to MacBook Pro
content: How do I transfer my current e-mails, archived e-mails and calendar events from a windows laptop to a new MacBook Pro?
